scripts.subtree:pull: git fetch git@github.com:alphara/alphara.github.io.git master && git subtree pull --prefix=build git@github.com:alphara/alphara.github.io.git master
scripts.subtree:push: git fetch git@github.com:alphara/alphara.github.io.git master && git subtree push --prefix=build git@github.com:alphara/alphara.github.io.git master
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run subtree:push
